modules.description: Provides functions for converting between simplified and traditional Chinese characters, including direct mapping and context-aware transformations. Operates on strings and processes input using predefined conversion tables. Used to normalize text input in multilingual applications and for data processing in Chinese language workflows.

Converts text between different Chinese character encodings using specified conversion rules. Operates on UTF-8 strings and conversion configurations stored in an opaque type. Applies simplified-to-traditional or traditional-to-simplified transformations in applications like text normalization or multilingual processing.
